attributes.action: put measures in place to prevent re-selling or transferring concert/gig tickets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The system for buying concert/gig tickets in the UK is clearly not working at the moment.
As soon as concerts are announced vendors are buying all the ticket stock and selling them on their own website at massively increased prices. £20 tickets are being sold for over £100 in some cases.
Simple measures like printing names on tickets when sold would help significantly to solve this problem and enable the real fans of these artists to attend.
